titles.title: United States-Israel Future of Warfare Act of 2023
United States-Israel Future of Warfare Act of 2023
A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to establish a fund for the conduct of collaborative defense projects between the United States and Israel in emerging technologies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
United States-Israel Future of Warfare Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Defense to establish the United States-Israel Future of Warfare Research and Development Fund to conduct collaborative defense projects between the United States and Israel in areas of emerging technologies (e.g., artificial intelligence). The purpose of the fund is to enable the U.S. Armed Forces and the military forces of Israel to meet emerging defense challenges.
